author_text: EMPI v0.0.0. Created and developed by David Krchňavý in 2024 as a bachelor thesis at FMFI UK in Bratislava.
username_hint: A nickname that you'll use to log in
username_wrong: Username con only contain letters and numbers
password_hint: This password is used to encrypt your data! If you forget it, you will be locked out of your account.
registration_ok: Registration successful. You may now log in using your credentials.
token_hint: This is your anonymous identifier that you will submit when you participate in a research.
